external_id.description: connection of this order item to the same order item on some other system

qty.description: primary inventory quantity ordered; if not specified, must specify SecondaryQty

secondary_qty.description: optional secondary quantity ordered; if not specified, must specify Qty

lot_number.description: if present, used to allocate matching inventory

serial_number.description: if present, used to allocate matching inventory

expiration_date.description: if present, used to allocate matching inventory

weight_imperial.description: ship weight of order item, imperial; if specified and metric not specified, business logic computes metric

weight_metric.description: ship weight of order item, metric; if specified and imperial not specified, business logic computes imperial; see WeightImperial for further explanation

proposed_allocations.description: empty on GET; may be supplied on PUT, POST

order_item_in_packages.description: declares the package arrangement, which gets translated into real packages, during order creation; empty on GET; ignored on PUT; may be supplied on POST
